title: How Glenn Youngkin Kept Trump at Arm’s Length, But on His Side
sub_head: Republican won Virginia governor’s race by keeping Trump supporters energized without making the former president the focal point of the race
body:
WASHINGTON—When Donald Trump released a statement suggesting he was planning a trip to Virginia last week, aides to Republican Glenn Youngkin’s campaign for governor panicked.
Mr. Youngkin had, for months, navigated the narrow path between embracing the former Republican president’s policies without being drawn into a debate about Mr. Trump himself. The two men held private phone calls in recent weeks, but Mr. Trump hadn’t said anything about a trip to Virginia.
